TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DataBindingHandlerAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class DataBindingHandlerAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class DataBindingHandlerAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指定設計階段類別，執行設計工具內控制項的資料繫結。

span.span: Specifies a design-time class that performs data binding of controls within a designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需屬性用法的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例定義名為的資料繫結處理常式`MyDataBindingHandler`，以供設計工具中編輯模式。The following code example defines a data-binding handler, named `MyDataBindingHandler`, to be used by the designer in editing mode. 在結束編輯模式，`Text`屬性值會顯示。On exiting the editing mode, the `Text` property value is displayed.
